verses.verse: And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Noach <WH5146>, Come <WH935> <WH8798> thou and all thy house <WH1004> into the ark <WH8392>; for thee have I seen <WH7200> <WH8804> righteous <WH6662> before me <WH6440> in this <WH2088> generation <WH1755>.

Of every clean <WH2889> beast <WH929> thou shalt take <WH3947> <WH8799> to thee by sevens <WH7651> <WH7651>, the male <WH376> and his female <WH802>: and of beasts <WH929> that are not clean <WH2889> <WH1931> by two <WH8147>, the male <WH376> and his female <WH802>.

Of fowls <WH5775> also of the air <WH8064> by sevens <WH7651> <WH7651>, the male <WH2145> and the female <WH5347>; to keep <WH2421> seed <WH2233> alive <WH2421> <WH8763> upon the face <WH6440> of all the earth <WH776>.

For yet <WH5750> seven <WH7651> days <WH3117>, and I will cause it to rain <WH4305> <WH8688> upon the earth <WH776> forty <WH705> days <WH3117> and forty <WH705> nights <WH3915>; and every <WH3605> living substance <WH3351> that I have made <WH6213> <WH8804> will I destroy <WH4229> <WH8804> from off <WH5921> the face <WH6440> of the earth <WH127>.
And Noach <WH5146> did <WH6213> <WH8799> according unto all that the YY <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> him.
And Noach <WH5146> was six <WH8337> hundred <WH3967> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> when the flood <WH3999> of waters <WH4325> was upon the earth <WH776>.

And Noach <WH5146> went in <WH935> <WH8799>, and his sons <WH1121>, and his wife <WH802>, and his sons <WH1121> ' wives <WH802> with him, into the ark <WH8392>, because of <WH6440> the waters <WH4325> of the flood <WH3999>.
Of clean <WH2889> beasts <WH929>, and of beasts <WH929> that are not clean <WH2889>, and of fowls <WH5775>, and of every thing that creepeth <WH7430> <WH8802> upon the earth <WH127>,

There went in <WH935> <WH8804> two <WH8147> and two <WH8147> unto Noach <WH5146> into the ark <WH8392>, the male <WH2145> and the female <WH5347>, as <WH834> 'Elohim <WH430> had commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> Noach <WH5146>.
And it came to pass after seven <WH7651> days <WH3117>, that the waters <WH4325> of the flood <WH3999> were upon the earth <WH776>.

In <WH8141> the six <WH8337> hundredth <WH3967> year <WH8141> of Noach's <WH5146> life <WH2416>, in the second <WH8145> month <WH2320>, the seventeenth <WH7651> <WH6240> day <WH3117> of the month <WH2320>, the same <WH2088> day <WH3117> were all the fountains <WH4599> of the great <WH7227> deep <WH8415> broken up <WH1234> <WH8738>, and the windows <WH699> of heaven <WH8064> were opened <WH6605> <WH8738>.
And the rain <WH1653> was upon the earth <WH776> forty <WH705> days <WH3117> and forty <WH705> nights <WH3915>.

In the selfsame <WH6106> day <WH3117> entered <WH935> <WH8804> Noach <WH5146>, and Shem <WH8035>, and Ham <WH2526>, and Yefet <WH3315>, the sons <WH1121> of Noach <WH5146>, and Noach's <WH5146> wife <WH802>, and the three <WH7969> wives <WH802> of his sons <WH1121> with them, into the ark <WH8392>;

They <WH1992>, and every beast <WH2416> after his kind <WH4327>, and all the cattle <WH929> after their kind <WH4327>, and every creeping thing <WH7431> that creepeth <WH7430> <WH8802> upon the earth <WH776> after his kind <WH4327>, and every fowl <WH5775> after his kind <WH4327>, every bird <WH6833> of every sort <WH3671>.
And they went in <WH935> <WH8799> unto Noach <WH5146> into the ark <WH8392>, two <WH8147> and two <WH8147> of all flesh <WH1320>, wherein <WH834> is the breath <WH7307> of life <WH2416>.

And they that went in <WH935> <WH8802>, went in <WH935> <WH8804> male <WH2145> and female <WH5347> of all flesh <WH1320>, as 'Elohim <WH430> had commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> him: and the YY <WH3068> shut him in <WH5462> <WH8799>.

And the flood <WH3999> was forty <WH705> days <WH3117> upon the earth <WH776>; and the waters <WH4325> increased <WH7235> <WH8799>, and bare up <WH5375> <WH8799> the ark <WH8392>, and it was lift up <WH7311> <WH8799> above the earth <WH776>.

And the waters <WH4325> prevailed <WH1396> <WH8799>, and were increased <WH7235> <WH8799> greatly <WH3966> upon the earth <WH776>; and the ark <WH8392> went <WH3212> <WH8799> upon the face <WH6440> of the waters <WH4325>.

And the waters <WH4325> prevailed <WH1396> <WH8804> exceedingly <WH3966> <WH3966> upon the earth <WH776>; and all the high <WH1364> hills <WH2022>, that were under <WH8478> the whole heaven <WH8064>, were covered <WH3680> <WH8792>.
Fifteen <WH6240> <WH2568> cubits <WH520> upward <WH4605> did the waters <WH4325> prevail <WH1396> <WH8804>; and the mountains <WH2022> were covered <WH3680> <WH8792>.

And all flesh <WH1320> died <WH1478> <WH8799> that moved <WH7430> <WH8802> upon the earth <WH776>, both of fowl <WH5775>, and of cattle <WH929>, and of beast <WH2416>, and of every creeping thing <WH8318> that creepeth <WH8317> <WH8802> upon the earth <WH776>, and every man <WH120>:
All in whose nostrils <WH639> was the breath <WH5397> <WH7307> of life <WH2416>, of all that was in the dry <WH2724> land, died <WH4191> <WH8804>.

And every living substance <WH3351> was destroyed <WH4229> <WH8735> which was upon the face <WH6440> of the ground <WH127>, both man <WH120>, and cattle <WH929>, and the creeping things <WH7431>, and the fowl <WH5775> of the heaven <WH8064>; and they were destroyed <WH4229> <WH8735> from the earth <WH776>: and Noach <WH5146> only <WH389> remained <WH7604> <WH8735> alive, and they that <WH834> were with him in the ark <WH8392>.
And the waters <WH4325> prevailed <WH1396> <WH8799> upon the earth <WH776> an hundred <WH3967> and fifty <WH2572> days <WH3117>.
